enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require checking the presence and validity of parameters, making them suitable for setting up test conditions.
Both methods involve validating the type and content of input parameters, which can be used to set up test cases with various input types.
Both methods throw exceptions for invalid parameters, making them useful for asserting expected exception behavior in tests.
Both methods handle and potentially transform input parameters, which can be used to assert expected transformations or validations in tests.
